# tertiarySystemGroupedBackground

**Type Property**

The color for content layered on top of secondary backgrounds of your grouped interface.

## Declaration

```swift
class var tertiarySystemGroupedBackground: UIColor { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this color for grouped content, including table views and platter-based designs.

## Grouped content background colors

- **systemGroupedBackground**: The color for the main background of your grouped interface.
- **secondarySystemGroupedBackground**: The color for content layered on top of the main background of your grouped interface.
